titles.title: Defending Veterans from Sequestration Act of 2015
To amend the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 to clarify the treatment of administrative expenses of the Department of Veterans Affairs during sequestration.
Defending Veterans from Sequestration Act of 2015

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Budget.

bill.summary:
Defending Veterans from Sequestration Act of 2015
Amends the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 (Gramm-Rudman-Hollings Act) to exempt administrative expenses of the Department of Veterans Affairs from any presidential sequestration order issued under that Act.
